elimination_consistency.interpretation: 49.6% of lowest fan vote contestants are also in lowest placement quartile (expected ~25-40%)

temporal_smoothness.interpretation: Average week-to-week change is 0.035 (smooth trajectory, not erratic)

cross_season_stability.interpretation: Fan vote distributions are 75.0% similar across seasons (stable pattern)

judge_correlation.interpretation: Moderate correlation (r=0.51) indicates fan votes are related to but not determined by judge scores
